mlflex.ensemblelearners
Class AbstractWeightedVoteEnsembleLearner

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.ensemblelearners.AbstractEnsembleLearner
      mlflex.ensemblelearners.AbstractWeightedVoteEnsembleLearner
Direct Known Subclasses:
WeightedVoteEnsembleLearner
public abstract class AbstractWeightedVoteEnsembleLearner
extends AbstractEnsembleLearner

Several of the ensemblelearners/combiner approaches in ML-Flex have a common characteristic: they assign weights to individual predictions before making the combined prediction. This class abstracts some of that common functionality.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo
